SentimentText: Everything seems to be going wrong.
I don't know how to feel about this.
I am so happy with my progress!
I don't think I can go on like this.
I love spending time with my family.
Why does everything bad happen to me?
I had a great day at work!
I don't see any point in living.
I'm very satisfied with the service.
I want to end my life.
The quality is poor and disappointing.
I am really happy with the results.
I feel like a burden to everyone.
I don't think I can keep going.
I'm afraid of what I might do.
I don't want to live anymore.
I am hopeful for the future.
I'm excited about the new opportunities.
This is the worst experience I've ever had.
I'm grateful for my friends and family.
I'm scared of my own thoughts.
